trans-unit.id: Could not determine your current location.
trans-unit.source: Could not determine your current location.

trans-unit.note: Could not download supported regions warning
trans-unit.target: TripGo konnte die Liste der verfügbaren Städte nicht herunterladen. Bitte versuche es später noch einmal.

trans-unit.note: 'Every %day' in context of repetitions (especially recurring events), e.g., 'Every Monday'
Everyday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.id: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.source: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.target: Ortungsdienste sind für dieses Feature benötigt. Bitte aktiviere sie in der Einstellungen-App unter Datenschutz > Ortungsdiesten > TripGo.

trans-unit.note: Never in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.id: Please try again or set your location manually.

trans-unit.note: Error when location search for %input was not successful.
Every weekday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)
Every weekend day in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.

Flight from a city to an other one
Option to use this trip for all similar cases.

Response to positive answer to question whether TripGo is useful, prompting for App Store rating.
Response to negative answer to question whether TripGo is useful, prompting for feedback.

trans-unit.note: Type for regular events that go in the phone's calendar.
Explanation for what calendar events are compared to habituals and stays. Can be long-ish.

trans-unit.id: Convenience is affected by things such as changing public transport services, the amount of walking, and finding a taxi.
trans-unit.source: Convenience is affected by things such as changing public transport services, the amount of walking, and finding a taxi.
trans-unit.target: Komfort wird davon beeinflusst, wie oft Verkehrsmittel gewechselt werden müssen, wieviel man laufen muss, die Schwierigkeit ein Taxi finden usw.

trans-unit.note: Error title when TripGo couldn't identify the user's current city.
trans-unit.target: TripGo konnte deine Stadt nicht finden.

trans-unit.note: Description for critical error where error will be shown below.
trans-unit.target: Die Anwendung hat einen kritischen Fehler gefunden und kann nicht wiederhergestellt werden:

trans-unit.note: Indicating the next trip is a current trip

trans-unit.source: Marking a transit stop as a favourite will allow quick access to its timetable.

trans-unit.id: Our End User Licence Agreement has changed. You must agree to it before continuing use of this app
trans-unit.source: Our End User Licence Agreement has changed. You must agree to it before continuing use of this app
trans-unit.target: Wir haben unsere EULA aktualisiert. Um die App zu verwenden, muss die neue EULA akzeptiert werden.

trans-unit.id: Permission was granted. Please go back and try again.
trans-unit.source: Permission was granted. Please go back and try again.
trans-unit.note: Text displayed when the user has given the app access to private data such as their calendar or contacts, but the user needs to perform the original action again to now see the results.

trans-unit.id: Plan a trip on your phone or press firmly to access your favourites.
trans-unit.source: Plan a trip on your phone or press firmly to access your favourites.

trans-unit.source: Please adjust your query and try again.

trans-unit.source: Please check your Calendar app and make sure you have a calendar configured.

trans-unit.target: Bitte öffne deine Kalender-App und überprüfe, dass du einen Kalendar eingerichtet hast.

trans-unit.source: Please delete the app and re-install from the App Store. Sorry for the inconvenience!

trans-unit.target: Bitte lösche die App und installiere sie erneut über den App Store.

trans-unit.note: Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
